content.text:
# Warrior Wrestling

Warrior Wrestling is an American independent professional wrestling promotion based in Chicago Heights, Illinois.

, there have been five reigns between five champions with one vacancy. Brian Cage holds three records for this title, first he is the inaugural champion, he has had the longest reign with the title at 531 days, while Will Ospreay's reign is shortest at 188 days and third he is also the oldest champion having won the title at 34 years, while KC Navarro is the youngest champion aged 22.
, the champion is KC Navarro who is in his first reign. He won the War of Attrition on June 18, 2022, at Warrior Wrestling 23 in Grand Rapids, Michigan.

There have been four reigns shared between four different champions. Aramis was the inaugural champion. The current champion is Gringo Loco who is in his first reign.

Warrior Wrestling Women's Championship
|image                 =
|caption               =
|currentholder         = Skye Blue
|won                   = June 10, 2023
|promotion             = Warrior Wrestling
|created               = May 12, 2019
|mostreigns            =
|firstchamp            = Tessa Blanchard
|longestreign          = Tessa Blanchard(489 days)
|shortestreign         = Thunder Rosa(245 days)
|youngest              = Tessa Blanchard()
|oldest                = Thunder Rosa()
|heaviest              = Kylie Rae()
|lightest              = Thunder Rosa()
|pastnames             =

, there have been four reigns between four champions with one vacancy. Tessa Blanchard was the inaugural champion. Blanchard's reign is the longest at 489 days, while Thunder Rosa's reign is the shortest at 245 days. Rosa was the oldest champion when she won it at 35 years old, while Blanchard was the youngest champion at 23 years old.
Athena is the current champion in his first reign. She defeated Shazza McKenzie and Skye Blue in a triple threat match for the vacant title at Warrior Wrestling 21 on April 23, 2022, in South Bend, Indiana.
Reigns
